synopsis.text:
One day, a young squirrel named Banner finds himself in an unusual predicament when he is rescued from a human by a compassionate cat on a farm. Adopted and raised as one of her own, Banner grows up surrounded by love but struggles to fit in with the other cats. Tragedy strikes when a devastating fire engulfs the farm, separating Banner from his beloved mother and forcing him to navigate the wilds of the forest alone.

In this unfamiliar environment, Banner must learn to embrace his true nature as a squirrel and develop the necessary skills to survive. Along the way, he encounters various forest creatures, including a wise old owl, a mischievous raccoon named Chourou, and a beautiful female squirrel named Sue who captures his heart. With time, Banner forms deep bonds with these newfound friends and learns valuable lessons about life, love, and the true meaning of family.

Join Banner on his heartwarming journey of self-discovery, growth, and friendship as he learns to adapt and thrive in the enchanting world of the forest.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
